content: this slouchy beanie features the words delay - deny - depose around the lower edge above this border skulls bloom from leafy stalks if you want to knit the beanie without the words an alternative chart with snowflakes is included in the pattern the yardage breakdown is as follows main colour green 110m /120 yards contrast colour 1 natural 95m/104 yards contrast colour 2 bronze 5m/6 yards the sample hat was knitted in rauma finullgarn 175m/50g finull is a woollen-spun rustic norwegian yarn that knits up much more robustly and thickly than a worsted-spun merino yarn of the same yardage and weight
